001import java.util.Stack;
002
003/**
004 * This class is part of the RPandaScape application. 
005 * RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game. 
006 *
007 * @author Elie DUBOUX
008 * @version 2021.12.12
009 */
010public class Player
011{
012    /**
013     * The name of the player.
014     */
015    private String aName;
016    /**
017     * The maximum weight a player can carry.
018     */
019    private int aWeightMax;
020    /**
021     * The money the player currently have.
022     */
023    private int aMoney;
024    /**
025     * The room where the player currently is.
026     */
027    private Room aCurrentRoom;
028    /**
029     * The rooms where the player passed by during the game.
030     */
031    private Stack<Room> aPreviousRooms;
032    /**
033     * The items that the player carry.
034     */
035    private ItemList aItems;
036    
037    /**
038     * Constructor.
039     * @param pName The name of the player.
040     * @param pWeightMax The maximum weight he can carry.
041     */
042    public Player(final String pName, final int pWeightMax)
043    {
044        this.aName = pName;
045        this.aWeightMax = pWeightMax;
046        this.aMoney = 0;
047        this.aPreviousRooms = new Stack<Room>();
048        this.aItems = new ItemList();
049    }//Player()
050    
051    /**
052     * Add a room in the previousRooms list.
053     * @param pPreviousRoom The rooms the player was previously.
054     */
055    public void pushPreviousRoom(final Room pPreviousRoom)
056    {
057        this.aPreviousRooms.push(pPreviousRoom);
058    }//pushPreviousRoom()
059    
060    /**
061     * Remove the last a room in the previousRooms list.
062     * @return The last room the player was previously.
063     */
064    public Room popPreviousRoom()
065    {
066        return this.aPreviousRooms.pop();
067    }//popPreviousRoom()
068    
069    /**
070     * Check if there is previous rooms.
071     * @return True if the previousRooms is empty,
072     * false if not.
073     */
074    public boolean isPreviousRoomsEmpty()
075    {
076        return this.aPreviousRooms.size() == 0;
077    }//isPreviousRoomsEmpty()
078    
079    /**
080     * Change the name of the player.
081     * @param pName The new player's name.
082     */
083    public void setName(final String pName)
084    {
085        this.aName = pName;
086    }//setName()
087    
088    /**
089     * Change the player's max weight.
090     * @param pWeightMax The new max weight.
091     */
092    public void setWeightMax(final int pWeightMax)
093    {
094        this.aWeightMax = pWeightMax;
095    }//setWeightMax()
096    
097    /**
098     * Change the room where the player is currently in.
099     * @param pCurrentRoom The new room.
100     */
101    public void setCurrentRoom(final Room pCurrentRoom)
102    {
103        this.aCurrentRoom = pCurrentRoom;
104    }//setCurrentRoom()
105    
106    /**
107     * Return the name of the player.
108     * @return The player's name.
109     */
110    public String getName()
111    {
112        return this.aName;
113    }//gteName()
114    
115    /**
116     * Return the player's max weight.
117     * @return The player's max weight.
118     */
119    public int getWeightMax()
120    {
121        return this.aWeightMax;
122    }//getWeightMax()
123    
124    /**
125     * Return the room where the player currently is.
126     * @return The player's name.
127     */
128    public Room getCurrentRoom()
129    {
130        return this.aCurrentRoom;
131    }//getCurrentRoom()
132    
133    /**
134     * Check if it's possible to remove the item X time(s).
135     * @param pItem The Item.
136     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
137     * @return True if the items can be removed,
138     * false if not.
139     */
140    public boolean isRemovePossible(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
141    {
142        if (this.aItems.hasEnough(pItem, pItemNb))
143            return true;
144        return false;
145    }//isRemovePossible()
146    
147    /**
148     * Check if it's possible to add the item X time(s).
149     * @param pItem The Item.
150     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
151     * @return True if the items can be added,
152     * false if not.
153     */
154    public boolean isAddPossible(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
155    {
156        if (this.aItems.getWeightTotal()+ pItem.getWeight()*pItemNb <= this.aWeightMax)
157            return true;
158        return false;
159    }//isAddPossible()
160    
161    /**
162     * Add one item X time(s) in the player inventory.
163     * @param pItem The item.
164     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
165     */
166    public void addItems(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
167    {
168        this.aItems.addItems(pItem, pItemNb);
169    }//addItems()
170    
171    /**
172     * Remove one item X time(s) in the player inventory.
173     * @param pItem The item.
174     * @param pItemNb The number of time.
175     */
176    public void removeItems(final Item pItem, final int pItemNb)
177    {
178        this.aItems.removeItems(pItem, pItemNb);
179    }//removeItems()
180    
181    /**
182     * Return the item with the name given in parameter.
183     * @param pItemName The name of the item.
184     * @return The item.
185     */
186    public Item getItem(final String pItemName)
187    {
188        return this.aItems.getItem(pItemName);
189    }//getItem()
190    
191    /**
192     * Return the inventory of the player as a String.
193     * @return The items with their number.
194     */
195    public String getItemsString()
196    {
197        return "The items you carry :\n" + this.aItems.toString() +
198               "The weight you carry / The max you can have: " + this.aItems.getWeightTotal() +" / " + this.aWeightMax + "\n" + 
199               "The money you have : "+ this.aMoney + "\n";
200    }//getItemsString()
201}//Player
